"use strict";
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
const types_1 = require("../../typesystem/types");
var Resolved;
(function (Resolved) {
    Resolved[Resolved["Unresolved"] = 0] = "Unresolved";
    Resolved[Resolved["Pending"] = 1] = "Pending";
    Resolved[Resolved["Resolved"] = 2] = "Resolved";
})(Resolved = exports.Resolved || (exports.Resolved = {}));
;
class ResolvableWrapper {
    constructor(manager, type, id) {
        this.manager = manager;
        this.type = type;
        this.id = id;
        this._status = Resolved.Pending;
        this.promise = this.manager.resolve(type, id);
        this.promise.then(() => this._status = Resolved.Resolved);
        this.model = this.manager.resolveData(type, id, this.modelFactory);
    }
    get [ResolvableWrapper.IsWrapper]() {
        return true;
    }
    status(field) {
        if (field == null)
            return this._status;
        if (this.getTypeOf(field) === types_1.PrimitiveType)
            return Resolved.Resolved;
        if (this.model[field] == null || this.manager.hasWrapper(this.getTypeOf(this.type), this.model[field]))
            return Resolved.Unresolved;
        return this.getHanlderOf(field)._status;
    }
    $get(field) {
        return this.getHanlderOf(field).promise;
    }
    _get(field) {
        return this.getHanlderOf(field).getHandler('_');
    }
    set(field, model) {
        if (this.getTypeOf(field) === types_1.PrimitiveType)
            return (this.model[field] = model);
        if (model[ResolvableWrapper.IsWrapper])
            this.model[field] = model.id;
        this.manager.transformData(this.getTypeOf(field), model);
        return this._get(field);
    }
    // TODO: Implement specific optimizations for this in implementing classes
    getHanlderOf(field) {
        return this.manager.getWrapperById(this.getTypeOf(field), this.model[field].id);
    }
}
ResolvableWrapper.IsWrapper = Symbol();
exports.ResolvableWrapper = ResolvableWrapper;
class ProxyWrapper extends ResolvableWrapper {
    constructor(manager, type, id) {
        super(manager, type, id);
        this.reducedType = this.manager.reduceType(this.type);
        this.reducedTypeMap = this.manager.getWrappersByType(this.reducedType);
        this.createHandlers();
    }
    createHandlers() {
        const _handler = {
            get: (target, name) => target._get(name),
            set: (target, name, value) => target.set(name, value),
        };
        this.handlers._ = new Proxy(this, _handler);
        const $handler = {
            get: (target, name) => target.$get(name),
            set: (target, name, value) => target.set(name, value),
        };
        this.handlers.$ = new Proxy(this, $handler);
    }
    getHandler(method) {
        return this.handlers[method];
    }
    getTypeOf() {
        return this.reducedType;
    }
    getHanlderOf(field) {
        return this.reducedTypeMap.getOrCreate(this.model[field].id);
    }
}
exports.ProxyWrapper = ProxyWrapper;
